chapters.title: Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info:
Samitsu Tamagowa,
      p. 71 (70)â€”Aes Sedai
      of the Yellow Ajah.  She is one of the best Healers alive, at least that
      do it in the traditional way.  She was the Aes Sedai left in charge of
      Cairhien when Cadsuane left prior to the
      cleansing of saidin, and is now with the entourage of sisters
      that obey Cadsuane and protect Rand.  She tried to
      Heal Rand's side wound and failed, but when
      Damer Flinn was able to Heal him using a more
      sophisticated weave, she begged on her knees for him to teach her.
      She is slender, has hazel eyes, and dark hair that she keeps bells in.
      She grew up in Arafel.
      See also
      Flinn, Damer;
      Roshan.
